thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 03 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Saudi's Almarai Acquires Controlling Stake In Pure Breed

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Saudi's Almarai Acquires Controlling Stake In Pure Breed
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - ALMARAI CO SJSC:
* ANNOUNCES THE ACQUISITION OF A CONTROLLING STAKE IN PURE BREED
* SAYS ACQUISITION OF 14 PERCENT OF SHARE CAPITAL OF PURE BREED COMPANY FROM VARIOUS SHAREHOLDERS IS FOR TOTAL CONSIDERATION OF SAR 20.3 MILLION,
* SAYS NOW CONTROLS 55.9 PERCENT OF SHARE CAPITAL OF PURE BREED
* SAYS TRANSACTION WAS FULLY FINANCED FROM ALMARAIS OPERATING CASH FLOW
* SAYS CO WILL BE CONSOLIDATING, WITHIN ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, PURE BREED RESULTS FROM Q2, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
